dict.string: MetaFit Nutri uses the camera to allow you to take and upload progress photos for nutritional monitoring. For example, you can capture images of your meals so our AI can analyze the food and calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fat. You can also share these photos with your nutritionist inside the app for personalized dietary guidance.

MetaFit Nutri needs access to your photo library so you can select existing meal photos for nutritional analysis. For example, if you took a photo of your breakfast earlier, you can choose it from your library and our AI will identify the foods and calculate the nutritional values to help you track your diet.

MetaFit Nutri can save your meal analysis photos to your device gallery. This allows you to keep a visual record of your analyzed meals for future reference and to track your nutritional progress over time.
